==Trivia==
{{w|Nehsi}} meaning "He of {{w|Nubia}}" was an official in the court of the Egyptian {{w|Pharaoh}} {{w|Hatshepsut}}. He held the title of chief {{w|Treasurer (Ancient Egypt)|treasurer}} among many others.
